meanings.definition: The condition of being a mosaic.
meanings.sent1: The mosaicism of the artwork created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent2: The mosaicism of the tiles in the bathroom added a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The mosaicism of colors in the painting made it look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her personality showed a mosaicism of traits, blending kindness and determination.
meanings.sent5: The garden displayed a mosaicism of flowers, creating a vibrant display.

meanings.definition: The presence of two or more populations of cells with different genotypes in an individual.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the mosaicism in the patient's skin cells.
meanings.sent2: The geneticist studied the mosaicism in the DNA samples.
meanings.sent3: The mosaicism in the lab samples puzzled the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The mosaicism in the blood cells was a fascinating discovery.
meanings.sent5: The mosaicism in the plant cells showed unique genetic variations.
